snippet: The lawyer for Bakary Camara, who says he was under a spell when he killed an ex-girlfriend, could not convince a judge of a man’s witchcraft credentials.
abstract: Justice Juan M Merchan of State Supreme Court in Manhattan rules that Cheikh Nado is not proficient enough in Senegalese witchcraft to testify as an expert witness at murder trial of Bakary Camara, who says he was under a spell when he killed Rita Morelli in 2011.
lead_paragraph: The lawyer for Bakary Camara, who says he was under a spell when he killed an ex-girlfriend, could not convince a judge of a man’s witchcraft credentials.

headline.seo: Would-Be Expert on Curses Is Deemed No Expert and Irrelevant in Murder Trial
headline.main: Would-Be Witness on Curses Is Ruled No Expert
headline.print_headline: Would-Be Witness on Curses Is Ruled No Expert
